title.rendered: Air Canada Offers – Fly to North America and Earn Bonus Miles

content.rendered:
Earn Bonus Aeroplane Miles while Fly to North America and Sun Destinations by Air Canada

  • Earn Bonus Aeroplan Miles for round-trip flights to anywhere in North America, as well as Sun destinations.
  • 750 Bonus Aeroplan Miles Economy Standard, Flex, Comfort or Latitude fares.
  • 1500 Bonus Aeroplan Miles Business Class, Premium Economy or Premium Rouge fares.

Terms and Conditions

  • You must register for this offer between June 15, 2018 and June 22, 2018.
  • Subject to the fare option purchased, either 750 or 1,500 Bonus Aeroplan Miles for eligible flights flown will be awarded for new bookings only made between June 15, 2018 and June 22, 2018 by 19:59 Eastern Time inclusively, for travel on eligible flights between June 15, 2018 and August 31, 2018.
  • In order to qualify as a new booking, the booking must have been created for the first time with a new booking reference number during the eligible booking period of the promotion. Any booking made prior to the start of the promotion that is subsequently changed to include travel dates within the qualifying travel period will not be considered a new booking that is eligible for the promotion.

Offer valid till 22 June 2018

To Book Tickets Click Here

View this deal here

About Air Canada

Air Canada is the flag carrier and largest airline of Canada by fleet size and passengers carried. The airline, founded in 1937, provides scheduled and charter air transport for passengers and cargo to 207 destinations worldwide.
